episode.title: Toner-Perfect Design
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Speculation on the purportedly-imminent new 4.7- and 5.5-inch iPhones, and the  rise of adaptive user interface layout and design on iOS. @3x, here we come.
